Analysis of the video: The expert would have analyzed the video in question to verify its authenticity. They would have looked for any inconsistencies or signs that the video may have been manipulated or staged.
Comparison with previous claims: The expert would have compared the current claim with any previous claims or incidents that may have been similar. In this case, they would have looked for any previous instances where the video was shared with a different claim or context.
Cross: referencing with reliable sources: The expert would have cross-referenced the claim with reliable sources such as news articles or official statements to see if there is any official confirmation or denial of the incident mentioned in the claim.
Assessment of credibility: The expert would have assessed the credibility of the sources sharing the claim. They would have looked for any signs of bias, misinformation, or manipulation that could cast doubt on the authenticity of the claim.
